sourcesContent:
<template>
    <Toolbar class="toolbar">
        <ButtonItem
            v-for="item in buttonArr"
            :key="item.command"
            :command="item.command"
            :icon="item.icon"
            :text="item.text"
        />
    </Toolbar>
</template>

<script>
import {Toolbar} from 'vg-editor'
import ButtonItem from './ButtonItem'
import {PUBLICARR, MINDARR} from './ToolBar'

export default {
    name: 'ToolBar',
    components: {
        Toolbar,
        ButtonItem
    },
    props: {
        graphType: {
            type: String,
            required: true
        }
    },
    computed: {
        buttonArr() {
            const {graphType} = this
            if (graphType === 'mind') return MINDARR
            return PUBLICARR
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="less">
.toolbar {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    height: 27px;

    .command i {
        display: inline-block;
        width: 27px;
        height: 27px;
        margin: 0 8px;
        padding-top: 10px;
        text-align: center;
        cursor: pointer;

        &:hover {
            border: 1px solid #e6e9ed;
        }
    }

    .disable i {
        color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
        cursor: auto;

        &:hover {
            border: 1px solid #fff;
        }
    }
}
</style>
